EmailTemplate.textOnly: We both know today’s shopper wants eCommerce, but how can you manage your brand experience and deliver high quality orders with a generic, inflexible marketplace-style eCommerce provider? We’re extending an offer for The Fresh Market to join our satisfied retailers with a customized, scalable eCommerce solution —like Northgate Markets— seeing 50% repeat customers and 90% fill rates in under two hours at their stores with superb curbside delivery. Northgate Markets, who utilize the strong integration between their existing POS and NCR Freshop, quickly gave their customers a new way to shop, and took advantage of new insights that gave them a deep, connected insights into store and shopper activity.
